alert.note: Alert for McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 5:22PM CDT until May 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McCulloch County in west central Texas... West central San Saba County in west central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Us-190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line, or near Rochelle, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Richland Springs around 555 PM CDT. Sloan around 605 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 190 Near The Mcculloch-San Saba County Line and Hall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
